name: Russian & Turkish Baths
description: Quintessential New York sauna. Purchase bulk passes for economic visits as low as 25 US dollars. The brief era of the over-chlorinated cold plunge (~2019-2022) appears to finally be over and the Russian & Turkish Baths reigns as the best NYC sauna.

name: BATHHOUSE
description: True to overproductionized Williamsburg. Hilarious Aufguss experiences served daily represents the commoditization of wellness culture. Recommend avoiding if not for the reasonably functional sauna and cold plunge.

name: Bota Bota, spa-sur-l'eau
description: On an immobile boat. The Williamsburg BATHHOUSE of the far north.

name: ROOFTOP Sauna
description: Bathtub cold plunges on a roof, of varying temperature. Experience sunset totonou at this one-of-a-kind sauna.
